title: An Apple lover’s dream! This refurbished MacBook Air is now under $300
content:
Macworld

With holiday gift-shopping lists taking shape, it’s smart to get a few major items crossed off early. And if they come with big savings attached, well, you’re getting your gift-giving off on the right foot.

Perfect for techies and Apple-obsessed loved ones, this pre-loved MacBook Air from 2015 is sure to be one of the standout gifts of the season in any household. Now through October 31st, it’s only $299.97 (reg. $529), which won’t wreck your shopping budget either!

While it’s refurbished, don’t fret about gifting this pre-owned MacBook Air. It has a Grade B rating, meaning it may have a few scratches on the outside, but performance shouldn’t be impacted.

Check out some of the specs your loved one will enjoy:

  • A 1.6GHz Intel Core i5 processor and 8GB of RAM for seamless multitasking
  • A 13-inch, 1440×900 resolution LED-backlit display with Intel HD Graphics 6000 offers crystal clear video and photo rendering
  • 128GB SSD for sufficient local storage for files and other media
  • Up to 12 hours of usage time on a single charge
  • And more!

There’s also easy Bluetooth and WiFi connectivity, so you can transfer files, connect peripherals, and work anywhere with the internet.

This holiday season, give the gift of Apple with this refurbished 13-inch MacBook Air with Intel Core i5, now just $299.97. No coupon is required, but this deal ends October 31st at 11:59pm Pacific!
